message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure an exceptional value while enjoying all the benefits this product has to offer.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the introductory price, $14,000 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of that, I would like to extend a counteroffer of $13,500 for the product. This is my best offer, considering the value it provides and the opportunity cost involved. I hope this meets your expectations.
